definition: wealth; abundance of valuable possessions or resources; often used to refer to material wealth or financial prosperity
examples: Der Reichtum des Landes liegt in seiner Vielfalt.
The country's wealth lies in its diversity.
Sie träumt von Reichtum und Luxus.
She dreams of wealth and luxury.
Wealth alone does not make you happy.
Er hat seinen Reichtum hart erarbeitet.
He has worked hard for his wealth.
